requests.name: Delete a library
requests.description: Remove a custom library, providing its name in the URL. Use basic-authentication!

requests.name: Add a library
requests.description: Add a custom library, providing its name in the URL. Use basic-authentication!

requests.name: Remove publication from library
requests.description: Remove a publication from a user's library, all specified in the URL. Use basic-authentication!

requests.name: Load a library
requests.description: Load a PublicationArray (array of id-title pairs) of all publications in a specific library. Use basic-authentication!

requests.name: Add a publication to a library
requests.description: Add a publication to a user's library, all specified in the URL. Use basic-authentication!

requests.name: List all libraries
requests.description: Load an array of all library names of a user. Basic-authentication is required.
